itunes:title: Exodus 1-6 -- Part 1 : Anthony Rivera Jr., MTS
title: Exodus 1-6 -- Part 1 : Anthony Rivera Jr., MTS
description:
How is Moses a type of Jesus Christ? Anthony Rivera, Jr. MTS discusses this and the importance of covenantal relationships, naming in the Book of Exodus, and what brings Moses to the mountain.

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/episodes
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

Please rate and review the podcast.
